title: BergIsak
author: BergIsak
content: On June 27, I won 5600 DOGE. Nevertheless, I could not withdraw the winnings. I sent a selfie with a piece of paper and a passport, a passport, and a bank statement, but the casino representatives ignore me and do not answer anything. But there is one important point. At some point, the button for uploading a document to the casino profile stopped working, and because of this I had to send them selfies by mail, but they ignore me there too. I want to figure out what's going on and understand why this situation has arisen. I have written complaints to several sites and I really hope that I will receive my winnings soon. I want as many people as possible to know about MBit and that they are not paying money. Has anyone encountered such a thing in this particular casino? I will be glad of your comments and ideas.

comments.author: hosemary
comments.body: Quote from: BergIsak on September 07, 2022, 12:11:45 PMHas anyone encountered such a thing in this particular casino?Yes. You are not the only one who has made a scam accusation against them. Visit the following threads. MBit SCAMMERSI can't withdraw my winnings from the MBit Casino for 2 months. Please help!!!MBIT CASINO SCAMMED ME[SCAM] mBit Casino ***DO NOT PLAY***

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: BergIsak on September 07, 2022, 12:11:45 PMOn June 27, I won 5600 DOGE. Nevertheless, I could not withdraw the winnings. I sent a selfie with a piece of paper and a passport, a passport, and a bank statement, but the casino representatives ignore me and do not answer anything. But there is one important point. At some point, the button for uploading a document to the casino profile stopped working, and because of this I had to send them selfies by mail, but they ignore me there too. I want to figure out what's going on and understand why this situation has arisen. I have written complaints to several sites and I really hope that I will receive my winnings soon. I want as many people as possible to know about MBit and that they are not paying money. Has anyone encountered such a thing in this particular casino? I will be glad of your comments and ideas. That's two months already you are that patient to post your issue now, we already have existing scam accusations on MBIT and they are all ignored by MBIT, their representative here is not active anymore with four existing scam accusations they are competing with 1xbit for the most number of accusations here in the scam section of Bitcointalk, you did the right thing posting your issues here, be sure to warn your friends who are active in casinos to avoid MBIT, if they don't want to be the next one posting here.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on September 07, 2022, 02:44:20 PMThat's two months already you are that patient to post your issue now, we already have existing scam accusations on MBIT and they are all ignored by MBIT, their representative here is not active anymore with four existing scam accusations they are competing with 1xbit for the most number of accusations here in the scam section of Bitcointalk, you did the right thing posting your issues here, be sure to warn your friends who are active in casinos to avoid MBIT, if they don't want to be the next one posting here.Can anyone post the official account of MBIT? If it's not tagged then it should be tagged and one of the victim can create a flag against them so that others can support. I checked one of the other thread and have not found any initiative from MBIT there. Ignoring is not a good solution.Quote from: BergIsak on September 07, 2022, 12:11:45 PMOn June 27, I won 5600 DOGE. Nevertheless, I could not withdraw the winnings. I sent a selfie with a piece of paper and a passport, a passport, and a bank statement, but the casino representatives ignore me and do not answer anything. But there is one important point. At some point, the button for uploading a document to the casino profile stopped working, and because of this I had to send them selfies by mail, but they ignore me there too. I want to figure out what's going on and understand why this situation has arisen. I have written complaints to several sites and I really hope that I will receive my winnings soon. I want as many people as possible to know about MBit and that they are not paying money. Has anyone encountered such a thing in this particular casino? I will be glad of your comments and ideas. Your accusation is not strong by the way, you need to attach proofs to support your accusation. Proofs like screenshot of conversation if any, deposit transaction ID and anything else that you think could support your case.Update: Profile found https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=262691But it seems they are not active on the forum from long time.

Proofs like screenshot of conversation if any, deposit transaction ID and anything else that you think could support your case.Update: Profile found https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=262691But it seems they are not active on the forum from long time.OP should create the right format to qualify his accusation, this is beginning to be a big concern I used to see 1XBIT almost every week with new accusations now we have Mbit for two or three in a row just this month, we never know if more are coming, they are randomly scamming their members so there will be fewer reports and those who are not aware where to report, just leave it unreported.There's this guy who claims to be part of the marketing team that opens a new thread for MbIT https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5411916.0 but the community is suspicious that he is part of the team and they just want to scam those who want to seek help, he lock the thread after getting expose.

comments.author: BergIsak
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on September 07, 2022, 02:44:20 PMQuote from: BergIsak on September 07, 2022, 12:11:45 PMOn June 27, I won 5600 DOGE. Nevertheless, I could not withdraw the winnings. I sent a selfie with a piece of paper and a passport, a passport, and a bank statement, but the casino representatives ignore me and do not answer anything. But there is one important point. At some point, the button for uploading a document to the casino profile stopped working, and because of this I had to send them selfies by mail, but they ignore me there too. I want to figure out what's going on and understand why this situation has arisen. I have written complaints to several sites and I really hope that I will receive my winnings soon. I want as many people as possible to know about MBit and that they are not paying money. Has anyone encountered such a thing in this particular casino? I will be glad of your comments and ideas. That's two months already you are that patient to post your issue now, we already have existing scam accusations on MBIT and they are all ignored by MBIT, their representative here is not active anymore with four existing scam accusations they are competing with 1xbit for the most number of accusations here in the scam section of Bitcointalk, you did the right thing posting your issues here, be sure to warn your friends who are active in casinos to avoid MBIT, if they don't want to be the next one posting here.Yes, thank you, I've read them. However, it is not entirely clear how it ended up there in the end. I'm just really upset, you know? I trusted this casino, it had excellent ratings. I liked the site, as well as a set of games and providers. I just don't understand why she behaved like that. There are so many complaints about MBit, why do they have such great ratings on review sites? Can't they be trusted? And then where can I see information about the casino?

comments.author: hosemary
comments.body: Quote from: BergIsak on September 08, 2022, 11:28:52 AMThere are so many complaints about MBit, why do they have such great ratings on review sites? Are you sure that they have great ratings?Their rating on trustpilot is only 2.2 from 5 and their review page is full of negative reviews.Even if they had a good rating on review websites like trustpilot, it didn't mean they are trustworthy. It's not difficult to buy fake reviews.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: hosseinimr93 on September 08, 2022, 04:40:56 PMQuote from: BergIsak on September 08, 2022, 11:28:52 AMThere are so many complaints about MBit, why do they have such great ratings on review sites? Are you sure that they have great ratings?Their rating on trustpilot is only 2.2 from 5 and their review page is full of negative reviews.Even if they had a good rating on review websites like trustpilot, it didn't mean they are trustworthy. It's not difficult to buy fake reviews. I've checked some of the review sites and many of them have good ratings on MBIT one of them even gave MBT a passing rating on their reviews of MBIT, I don't need to mention what review sites are those as I don't want to promote them here in Bitcointalk, people should pick the right review sites to read, believe in and sign up with their referrals, many of them are paid reviewer and it will do players good if they check Bitcointalk as their source of good reviews.

comments.author: BergIsak
comments.body: Quote from: hosseinimr93 on September 08, 2022, 04:40:56 PMQuote from: BergIsak on September 08, 2022, 11:28:52 AMThere are so many complaints about MBit, why do they have such great ratings on review sites? Are you sure that they have great ratings?Their rating on trustpilot is only 2.2 from 5 and their review page is full of negative reviews.Even if they had a good rating on review websites like trustpilot, it didn't mean they are trustworthy. It's not difficult to buy fake reviews. Unfortunately, I haven't looked at the MBit casino rating on this site. I thought that reviews on sites like Casino GURU and AskGamblers would be enough, but now I understand that this is not the case. I'll be more careful from now on.

comments.author: Rieeir
comments.body: Quote from: BergIsak on September 12, 2022, 07:57:24 AMQuote from: hosseinimr93 on September 08, 2022, 04:40:56 PMQuote from: BergIsak on September 08, 2022, 11:28:52 AMThere are so many complaints about MBit, why do they have such great ratings on review sites? Are you sure that they have great ratings?Their rating on trustpilot is only 2.2 from 5 and their review page is full of negative reviews.Even if they had a good rating on review websites like trustpilot, it didn't mean they are trustworthy. It's not difficult to buy fake reviews. Unfortunately, I haven't looked at the MBit casino rating on this site. I thought that reviews on sites like Casino GURU and AskGamblers would be enough, but now I understand that this is not the case. I'll be more careful from now on.Before you deposit money, you really should carefully read the reviews and study the pros and cons of a particular casino. I think this situation will be a good lesson for you and you will no longer play in unreliable casinos.
